seo.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
seo.description: Find answers to your questions about RENAISSANCE Paris eyewear: orders, shipping, returns, care, warranty and partner opticians.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.a: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are secure and encrypted.

modifyOrder.q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
modifyOrder.a: You can modify or cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it by contacting us immediately. After this period, your order is being prepared.

invoice.a: Yes, a detailed invoice will be sent to you by email as soon as your order is shipped.

deliveryTimes.a: Orders are shipped within 24-48 hours. Delivery in metropolitan France takes 1-2 business days, 2-3 days for the EU, and 3-7 days internationally.

freeShipping.a: Yes, shipping is free for all orders, regardless of destination.

trackOrder.a: Yes, you will receive a tracking number by email as soon as your order is shipped. You can track your package in real time.

internationalShipping.a: Yes, we ship worldwide. Customs fees may apply depending on the country and are the responsibility of the recipient.

returnPolicy.a: You have 14 days from receipt to return your order. The product must be in its original condition with intact packaging. Return shipping is covered by Renaissance.

howToReturn.q: How do I make a return?
howToReturn.a: Contact our customer service at contact@renaissance-eyewear.fr with your order number. We will send you a prepaid return label and instructions.

refundDelay.a: The refund is processed within 14 days of receiving and validating your return, using the original payment method.

exchangeFrame.a: Yes, we offer free exchanges. Contact us to arrange the exchange of your frame.

chooseSize.q: How do I choose the right frame size?
chooseSize.a: Check our Size Guide which details the dimensions of each model. You can also try our frames at one of our 200+ partner opticians.

prescriptionLenses.q: Are the frames compatible with prescription lenses?
prescriptionLenses.a: Yes, all our optical frames can accommodate your prescription lenses. Visit a partner optician for fitting.

cleanGlasses.q: How do I care for my Renaissance glasses?
cleanGlasses.a: Clean your glasses with the included microfiber cloth. Avoid harsh chemicals. Store them in their case when not wearing them.

warranty.q: What is the warranty on the frames?
warranty.a: All our frames come with a 2-year manufacturer's warranty covering manufacturing defects.

tryBeforeBuy.q: Can I try the glasses before buying?
tryBeforeBuy.a: Yes, visit one of our 200+ partner opticians in France to try our collections and receive personalized advice.

findOptician.q: How do I find a partner optician?
findOptician.a: Use our optician locator on the "Find an Optician" page to find the nearest point of sale.

samePrices.q: Are prices the same online and at opticians?
samePrices.a: Yes, our prices are identical on our website and at our partner opticians.

contactService.q: How do I contact customer service?
contactService.a: You can reach us by email at contact@renaissance-eyewear.fr or by phone at +33 1 42 86 82 00 (Mon-Fri, 9am-6pm).

responseDelay.q: What is the customer service response time?
responseDelay.a: We are committed to responding to all inquiries within 48 business hours.

customization.q: Do you offer a customization service?
customization.a: Contact us to discuss your customization needs. Some options may be available on request.
